definition: A solid construction element typically found in buildings, commonly used as a flooring material. It provides a sturdy and durable surface, often used in industrial or commercial settings due to its strength and resistance to wear and tear.

examples.english: The concrete floor is very sturdy.

examples.german: Wir haben den Betonboden neu gegossen.
examples.english: We have poured a new concrete floor.

examples.german: Der Betonboden ist glatt und eben.
examples.english: The concrete floor is smooth and level.
The concrete floor still needs to dry.

examples.german: Der Betonboden ist leicht zu reinigen.
examples.english: The concrete floor is easy to clean.
